alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL ADAMS COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emmitsburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Littlestown, Carroll Valley, Two Taverns and Liberty Mountain Resort. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
